category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_ReqEditor
preference.preference_description: Determines the type of editor allowed to be used for the life of created objects in the Active Workspace client. Note that any change of value does not retroactively change the allowed editors associated to already created objects. Valid values are: * Plain: only plain text editors are allowed. * HTML: only Rich Text File (RTF) editors are allowed. This is the default value. * Word: only Word document editors are allowed.
